subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|ic}} – one person ({{zh-l|*大}}) holding two other people ({{zh-l|*人}}) under his arm, or two people ({{zh-l|*人}}) sandwiching a person ({{zh-l|*大}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[squeeze]] between; to [[pinch]]; to [[clamp]]; to [[hold]] between
# to [[carry]] under one's [[arm]]
# to [[place]] in between; to be [[locate]]d between; to be [[wedge]]d [[between]]
# on or from [[both]] [[side]]s
# {{†}} to [[support]]; to [[assist]]
# to [[mix]]; to [[intermingle]]; to [[intersperse]]
# [[clip]]; [[clamp]]
# [[folder]]; [[wallet]]
# {{†}} [[torture]] [[device]] used to [[squeeze]] the [[ankle]]s
#: {{zh-syn|夾棍}}
# {{†}} [[wharf]] by a [[river]]
# {{†}} {{zh-short|夾室}}
# {{†}} {{zh-short|夾鐘}}
